SEARCH
Package gui

Class SelectFromRestMenuController

java.lang.Object
gui.SelectFromRestMenuController
public class SelectFromRestMenuController extends Object
Controller class for the restaurant menu selection screen. Handles interactions with the menu, cart, and navigation buttons.
Version:
August 2024
Author:
Kfir Amoyal, Noam Furman, Israel Ohayon, Eitan Zerbel, Yaniv Shatil, Omri Heit

    • restoreState

      public void restoreState(SelectFromRestMenuController previousState)
      Restores the state of the controller from a previous instance.
      Parameters:
      previousState - the previous state of the controller

    • loadRestaurant

      public void loadRestaurant(ArrayList<Restaurant> restaurants)
      Loads the restaurants into the controller. This method is used to pass restaurant data from a previous screen.
      Parameters:
      restaurants - An ArrayList of Restaurant objects to be loaded into the controller.

    • loadRestaurantOrders

      public void loadRestaurantOrders(RestaurantOrders restaurantOrders)
      Loads the restaurant orders into the controller. This method is used to pass restaurant order data from a previous screen.
      Parameters:
      restaurantOrders - A RestaurantOrders object to be loaded into the controller.

    • getCartItems

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<SelectFromRestMenuController.CartItem> getCartItems()
      Retrieves the current items in the cart.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of CartItem objects representing the items currently in the cart.
